meta.name: An Post Irish Book of the Year
meta.description: A look at the shortlist and winner of the An Post Irish Book of the Year 2024.

videos.title: An Post Irish Book of the Year 2025
videos.overview: Oliver Callan presents an insight into the six books and six authors competing for the award', culminating in the reveal of this year's overall winner.
